statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE cost_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY selling_price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE cost_price < selling_price
SELECT product_name, cost_price FROM products WHERE selling_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY cost_price
SELECT product_name, cost_price, quantity FROM products WHERE cost_price > 30 AND quantity > 10
SELECT AVG(cost_price) AS average_cost_price FROM products
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products;
SELECT product_id, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sales INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE selling_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price < 50 OR selling_price > 100 ORDER BY cost_price, selling_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 5 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.sale_date FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10 ORDER BY s.quantity DESC, s.sale_date ASC LIMIT 15;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products ORDER BY selling_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50;
SELECT expense_id, category, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount < 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, sale_price, sale_date FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE cost_price > selling_price;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE cost_price < 50;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products ORDER BY selling_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, cost_price FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50;
SELECT id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT product_id, profit AS net_profit FROM profits WHERE margin > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 100 ORDER BY selling_price ASC;
SELECT p.name, SUM(s.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT e.description, e.amount, p.name FROM expenses e JOIN products p ON e.amount < p.cost_price;
SELECT p.name, pr.profit, pr.margin FROM products p JOIN profits pr ON p.id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.profit > 500 ORDER BY pr.margin DESC;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE product_id = 2
SELECT sale_id, quantity, sale_date FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT profit_amount, profit_margin FROM profit WHERE sale_id = 10 ORDER BY profit_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE selling_price < 100 ORDER BY selling_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price > 50 AND selling_price < 200 ORDER BY selling_price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.sale_date FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10 ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
